title: Ref Guide: clean up how to publish Ref Guide docs
description:
When I first wrote the How to Publish the Ref Guide docs (solr/solr-ref-guide/meta-docs/publish.adoc I assumed that PDF and HTML versions would be built & released separately. That's not the case - I always do them at the same time, but I rely on the docs for each step and find myself having to jump back and forth across the page.

This will merge the separate PDF and HTML sections into a single seamless process that covers both versions.
